meanings.definition: The state or quality of being merry.
meanings.sent1: The merrinesses of the holiday season filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter and smiles added to the merrinesses of the party.
meanings.sent3: The merrinesses of the children playing in the park brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The merrinesses of the celebration were like colorful confetti falling from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The merrinesses of the music made even the grumpiest person tap their feet.

meanings.definition: Acts or expressions of merriment or joy.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with various merrinesses, from jokes to cheerful songs.
meanings.sent2: Their merrinesses were contagious, spreading happiness to all around them.
meanings.sent3: The merrinesses of the clown's performance had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the merrinesses of a child on Christmas morning.
meanings.sent5: The merrinesses of the festival could be seen in the colorful decorations and smiling faces.
